column9: Households with any member earning more than Rs. 10,000 p.m
column10: Households with three or more rooms with pucca walls and pucca roof
column11: Households owning 2.5 acres or more irrigated land with at least one irrigation equipment
column12: Household owning 5 acres or more land irrigated for two or more crop seasons
column13: Households owning 7.5 acres or more land with at least one irrigation equipment
column14: Households having Kisan credit card with the credit limit of Rs.50,000 and above
column20: Only one room with kucha walls and kucha roof
column21: No adult member between age 16 to 59
column22: Female headed households with no adult male member between age 16 to 59
column23: Disabled member and no able bodied adult member
column26: Landless households deriving major part of their income from manual casual labour
